result.execSummary:
The defendant Garrion L Smith, #534887 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Aggravated Battery-Intend Bodily Harm, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(4).
  • OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Garrion L Smith in court with attorney Daniel P Repka.  Defendant Garrion L Smith in custody.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 238pm Atty Repka- Def would like to w/draw plea and req a continuance; move forward with trial. State- objects. CT denies continuance. 

SENTENCING: 

Ct 1: 6 yrs prison. 3 IC, 3 ES. $290.60 fine/cost. AS. no illeg, no para. sub testing. 486 days sent credit.

Ct 5: 5 yrs prison. 2 IC, 3 ES. $1690 fine/cost, No contact w/Pamela Moore, 24 mos rev DL. AS. no illeg, no para. sub testing. 486 days sent credit.

sentences are to run concurrent to one another, but consecutive to St Croix County time serving. CIP- not elig. SAP- not elig. 

Atty Repka- does not contest RST in amount of $1828.35. CT signs Order. $25/mo to be paid out of prison wages towards RST. 353pm adj.
